root: ^Wow, quite the place you got here, Folkvar

Jester: ^Well Hello! I am the King’s new jester! I’m the old jester’s replacement after he made a bad joke…
NetJester: ^What do you learn in witch school?
FolJester: ^Which one of Lord Arthur’s knights invented the round table?
King: ^Well hello dear son! It sounds like you've caused quite a stir about the castle tonight!
^My most sincere of apologies, father. It took longer than expected. In better news, Netrixi has discovered an overwhelming quantity of Beholderite. She will help us secure it and bring it to safety.
^Brilliant! Do not delay. Go and bring that Beholderite back to me! I mean, the castle! So we can... uh store it in the vault? Yes, store it in the vault!
^Your wish is my command father, but there's one small complication. We were attacked by bandits on the way here, and we need to bring holy vengeance upon them.
^Yes, my son! You must crush your enemies. You may find the bandits you seek in the Caverns of Cathuloo. Now, off you go!
